name: Space (Hassan-ALHaddad)
description:
Not complete 70%, but still you can play with no event its fun :)

its take too much time 2 days.

My first 3D game and  first creating character by blender it was fun

 

Controls:

1-To walk character [W,D,S,A] and [mouse]

2-To run character hold [Shift]

3- To drive spaceship or start the game press (F)

4-To drive spaceship press  [W,D,S,A] and [Space]

5-To look back from camera hold [Cntrl]

have fun and thanks <3  :)
